amendment.description: Amendment restores $32 million for child abuse prevention and treatment programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds appropriated for community based resource centers for child abuse prevention and treatment by $32.8 million. Funds appropriated for the Goals 2000 program and the Unemployment Insurance contingency and computer funds would be reduced commensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
